title._content: [Trans-Siberian Railway metal truss bridge on stone piers, over the Kama River near Perm, Ural Mountains Region] (LOC)

description._content: To Make Your Own Color Photo from the Original Glass Plate Negatives, use this file: www.loc.gov/pictures/resource/prok.00023/ Prokudin-Gorskiĭ, Sergeĭ Mikhaĭlovich, 1863-1944, photographer. [Trans-Siberian Railway metal truss bridge on stone piers, over the Kama River near Perm, Ural Mountains Region] [ca. 1910] 1 negative (3 frames) : glass, b&w, three-color separation ; 24 x 9 cm. Notes: Title devised by Library staff, based on information from several sources. Forms part of: Sergei Mikhailovich Prokudin-Gorskii Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Railroad bridges. Truss bridges. Rivers. Russia (Federation)--Kama River. Russia (Federation)--Permʹ. Russia (Federation)--Ural Mountains Region. Format: Glass negatives. Color separation negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. For additional information on commercial use, see "Prokudin-Gorskii...," lcweb.loc.gov/rr/print/res/237_prok.html Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/prokc.20023 Call Number: LC-P87- 32x
